title: Hands-on Report
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Fufu.... Ufufu....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What are you doing, Ayumu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, Rin-chan. You see, I’m watching cat videos. After I watched one more just kept popping up in the recommendation, so I couldn’t stop....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin also likes cats! Can Rin watch it with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course! Here, come look at this one. It’s showing its belly while lying down....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It looks like it’s feeling so good from being pet nya~. Why do cats make this face when they’re being petted? Does it feel that good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hmm, I wonder? Can I try petting you, Rin-chan? Tell me if it feels good afterward, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Leave it to me nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>*Stroke stroke*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nya~~~~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
